00005 import os

00008 from tweepy.binder import bind_api
00009 from tweepy.error import TweepError
00010 from tweepy.parsers import ModelParser, RawParser
00011 from tweepy.utils import list_to_csv
00012 
00013 
00014 class API(object):
00015     """Twitter API"""
00016 
00017     def __init__(self, auth_handler=None,
00018             host='api.twitter.com', search_host='search.twitter.com',
00019              cache=None, secure=False, api_root='/1', search_root='',
00020             retry_count=0, retry_delay=0, retry_errors=None,
00021             parser=None):
00022         self.auth = auth_handler
00023         self.host = host
00024         self.search_host = search_host
00025         self.api_root = api_root
00026         self.search_root = search_root
00027         self.cache = cache
00028         self.secure = secure
00029         self.retry_count = retry_count
00030         self.retry_delay = retry_delay
00031         self.retry_errors = retry_errors
00032         self.parser = parser or ModelParser()
00033 
00034     """ statuses/public_timeline """
00035     public_timeline = bind_api(
00036         path = '/statuses/public_timeline.json',
00037         payload_type = 'status', payload_list = True,
00038         allowed_param = []
00039     )
00040

00043         path = '/statuses/home_timeline.json',
00044         payload_type = 'status', payload_list = True,
00045         allowed_param = ['since_id', 'max_id', 'count', 'page'],
00046         require_auth = True
00047     )

00170     """ Perform bulk look up of users from user ID or screenname """
00171     def lookup_users(self, user_ids=None, screen_names=None):
00172         return self._lookup_users(list_to_csv(user_ids), list_to_csv(screen_names))
00173 
00174     _lookup_users = bind_api(
00175         path = '/users/lookup.json',
00176         payload_type = 'user', payload_list = True,
00177         allowed_param = ['user_id', 'screen_name'],
00178     )
00179 
00180     """ Get the authenticated user """
00181     def me(self):
00182         return self.get_user(screen_name=self.auth.get_username())

00309     """ account/verify_credentials """
00310     def verify_credentials(self):
00311         try:
00312             return bind_api(
00313                 path = '/account/verify_credentials.json',
00314                 payload_type = 'user',
00315                 require_auth = True
00316             )(self)
00317         except TweepError, e:
00318             if e.response and e.response.status == 401:
00319                 return False
00320             raise
00321

00349     """ account/update_profile_image """
00350     def update_profile_image(self, filename):
00351         headers, post_data = API._pack_image(filename, 700)
00352         return bind_api(
00353             path = '/account/update_profile_image.json',
00354             method = 'POST',
00355             payload_type = 'user',
00356             require_auth = True
00357         )(self, post_data=post_data, headers=headers)
00358 
00359     """ account/update_profile_background_image """
00360     def update_profile_background_image(self, filename, *args, **kargs):
00361         headers, post_data = API._pack_image(filename, 800)
00362         bind_api(
00363             path = '/account/update_profile_background_image.json',
00364             method = 'POST',
00365             payload_type = 'user',
00366             allowed_param = ['tile'],
00367             require_auth = True
00368         )(self, post_data=post_data, headers=headers)

00442         try:
00443             bind_api(
00444                 path = '/blocks/exists.json',
00445                 allowed_param = ['id', 'user_id', 'screen_name'],
00446                 require_auth = True
00447             )(self, *args, **kargs)
00448         except TweepError:
00449             return False
00450         return True

00519     def create_list(self, *args, **kargs):
00520         return bind_api(
00521             path = '/%s/lists.json' % self.auth.get_username(),
00522             method = 'POST',
00523             payload_type = 'list',
00524             allowed_param = ['name', 'mode', 'description'],
00525             require_auth = True
00526         )(self, *args, **kargs)
00527 
00528     def destroy_list(self, slug):
00529         return bind_api(
00530             path = '/%s/lists/%s.json' % (self.auth.get_username(), slug),
00531             method = 'DELETE',
00532             payload_type = 'list',
00533             require_auth = True
00534         )(self)
00535 
00536     def update_list(self, slug, *args, **kargs):

00539             method = 'POST',
00540             payload_type = 'list',
00541             allowed_param = ['name', 'mode', 'description'],
00542             require_auth = True
00543         )(self, *args, **kargs)

00659         path = '/search.json',

00661         allowed_param = ['q', 'lang', 'locale', 'rpp', 'page', 'since_id', 'geocode', 'show_user', 'max_id', 'since', 'until', 'result_type']
00662     )
00663     search.pagination_mode = 'page'

00720 
00721     """ Internal use only """
00722     @staticmethod
00723     def _pack_image(filename, max_size):
00724         """Pack image from file into multipart-formdata post body"""
00725         # image must be less than 700kb in size
00726         try:
00727             if os.path.getsize(filename) > (max_size * 1024):
00728                 raise TweepError('File is too big, must be less than 700kb.')
00729         except os.error, e:
00730             raise TweepError('Unable to access file')
00731 
00732         # image must be gif, jpeg, or png
00733         file_type = mimetypes.guess_type(filename)
00734         if file_type is None:
00735             raise TweepError('Could not determine file type')
00736         file_type = file_type[0]
00737         if file_type not in ['image/gif', 'image/jpeg', 'image/png']:
00738             raise TweepError('Invalid file type for image: %s' % file_type)
00739 
00740         # build the mulitpart-formdata body
00741         fp = open(filename, 'rb')
00742         BOUNDARY = 'Tw3ePy'
00743         body = []
00744         body.append('--' + BOUNDARY)
00745         body.append('Content-Disposition: form-data; name="image"; filename="%s"' % filename)
00746         body.append('Content-Type: %s' % file_type)
00747         body.append('')
00748         body.append(fp.read())
00749         body.append('--' + BOUNDARY + '--')
00750         body.append('')
00751         fp.close()
00752         body = '\r\n'.join(body)
00753 
00754         # build headers
00755         headers = {
00756             'Content-Type': 'multipart/form-data; boundary=Tw3ePy',
00757             'Content-Length': str(len(body))
00758         }
00759 
00760         return headers, body
00761
